ygData.subject: Re: [The EverQuest Tavern] Re: WHAT IS WRONG WITH EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, i am also having problems signing in. It keeps telling me that it cannot establish a connection with the server. I have found that if i try logging
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, i am also having problems signing in. It keeps telling me that it cannot establish a connection with the server. I have found that if i try logging on around 6 in the evening, i can get on with little problem, but any other time it is jammed.
Best of luck , Melefanter 19 Ranger/Tribunal
timmye_ea <no_reply@yahoogroups.com> wrote: Must be your account, or your pc. I started my pc up and patched it
yesterday with no problem. However, when I went to sign in, it just
hung. And I was not able to alt tab out of it, so I had to hard power
my system down. This problem repeated itself everytime I logged in
until I remembered to check my firewall. Once I cleared eq for
access, I was able to get in with no problem.
However, the nasty eq disconnect me for no reason happened within
15 minutes of being in game. Had to reboot. Got back in with no
problems and played smoothly for 2 hours before I camped out.

Timmye Cousteau

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., zephlarus <no_reply@y...> wrote:
> I have been trying to log in for two days now. Is there something
> wrong with my account, or is everyone STILL haveing problems?
